title: (x) Finch logo fat script - Candy Script {Akira}
content:
Can someone please identify the font on this logo?  
You can see a larger version of the logo at [www.getfinch.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905124654/http:/www.getfinch.com/ "www.getfinch.com")  
Thank you!!
